name: Worker Schedule Management
description: Advanced worker schedule management with conflict detection and availability tracking

prd.problem: Creating crew schedules that account for worker availability, skills, PTO, and task requirements is time-consuming and prone to errors. Workers often don't know their schedule until the last minute, causing confusion and no-shows.
prd.solution: Build a comprehensive scheduling system that allows superintendents to create weekly/monthly schedules, assign workers to shifts, detect conflicts (PTO, double-booking), match skills to tasks, and publish schedules for workers to view. Include worker availability input and shift swap requests.
successCriteria: Workers can view their schedule in advance
Shift swap request and approval workflow
Notifications when schedule is published or changed
risks: Last-minute schedule changes may cause issues
